About the game: 
================
Universe Sandbox Ã‚Â² is a physics based space simulator that merges real-time gravity, climate, collision, and material interactions to reveal the beauty of our universe and the fragility of our planet. It's the long awaited sequel to the original Universe Sandbox. 


Features:
==========
Awesome Collisions
Climate Simulation
Terraforming
Deform the Surface
Stellar evolution & supernovae
and more...
